actions.description: The archer makes two Shortsword or Longbow attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.
actions.name: Shortsword

actions.description: 6 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.
actions.name: Longbow
